item.description:
Specific Topic: Allergies and Other Similar Techniques

Since we did not get to allergies in the last meeting, let's attack that and similar issues in this workshop. 

Like always, we will have some fun.

 

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.  Kevin Martin 978-273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group
